data.text: Akoma mu nhyehyɛeɛ yɛ onipa dea,
Ɛyɛ onipa sɛ nʼakwan nyinaa yɛ kronn
Fa deɛ woyɛ nyinaa hyɛ Awurade nsam,
Awurade yɛ biribiara ma nʼankasa botaeɛ,
Awurade kyiri akoma mu ahantanfoɔ nyinaa.
Wɔnam ɔdɔ ne nokorɛ so pata bɔne;
Sɛ onipa akwan sɔ Awurade ani a,
Kakraa bi a wɔnam tenenee kwan so nya no yɛ
Onipa yɛ ne nhyehyɛeɛ wɔ nʼakoma mu,
Ɔhene anomu kasa te sɛ nkɔmhyɛ,
Nsania ne abrammoɔ a nsisie nni mu firi Awurade;
Ahemfo kyiri bɔneyɛ,
Ahemfo ani sɔ ano a ɛka nokorɛ;
Ɔhene abufuhyeɛ yɛ owuo somafoɔ,
Sɛ ɔhene anim te a, ɛyɛ nkwa,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛnya nyansa sene sɛ wobɛnya sikakɔkɔɔ,
Ɔteneneeni kwantempɔn kwati bɔne;
Ahantan di ɔsɛeɛ anim,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ honhom mu hiani wɔ wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so mu
Deɛ ɔyɛ ɔsetie ma nkyerɛkyerɛ no nya nkɔsoɔ;
Wɔfrɛ akoma mu anyansafoɔ sɛ nhunumufoɔ,
Nteaseɛ yɛ nkwa nsutire ma wɔn a wɔwɔ bi,
Onyansafoɔ akoma kyerɛ nʼano kwan,
Abodwosɛm te sɛ ɛwokyɛm
Ɛkwan bi wɔ hɔ a ɛyɛ wɔ onipa ani so,
Odwumayɛfoɔ akɔnnɔ ma no yɛ adwuma den;
Ohuhuni bɔ pɔ bɔne,
Onipa kɔntɔnkye de mpaapaemu ba,
Basabasayɛni daadaa ne yɔnko
Deɛ ɔbu nʼani no redwene bɔneyɛ ho;
Ɛdwono yɛ animuonyam abotire;
Deɛ ɔwɔ abodwokyerɛ no yɛ sene ɔkofoɔ,
Wɔtwe ntonto de hwehwɛ deɛ Awurade pɛ,
